profile.title: Software Engineer
aboutMe: 7 years of experience in making scalable, secure, database-driven componentized web applications and internal tooling both with a team and as an individual.
Excellent leadership skills and keen at meeting strict deadlines.
Quick learner who isn't afraid to get their hands dirty on legacy projects and will put in the extra work to meet the highest quality standards.

contractExperience.title: Software Engineer
accomplishments: Developed all internal tooling for handling the workflow needed to safely assess and remove asbestos for over 3,000 completed projects and counting.
Used to handle sensitive data which meets the strict guidelines and approval by the Australian government
Developed internal tooling using TDD for full e2e test coverage so that important onsite workflows run uninterrupted.
Built using the latest browser and device support considerations with Typescript and Apollo for fast development; all hosted via Netlify for no cost.
Developed a Typescript GQL endpoint using Prisma ORM for CRUD operations; served using a Serverless Lambda all for no cost.
Developed a public-facing website using GatsbyJS for blazing fast load times with a Lighthouse audit score of 95+ in all categories; complete with full SEO and Google Analytics.
Helped Jesco receive a government contract to oversee the demolition of the loose-fill asbestos-insulated houses for years in Canberra, ACT with this software.

contractExperience.title: Software Engineer
accomplishments: Built an internal web application (built with React, Typescript, and GraphQL) from the ground up that was pivotal in empowering Creative Strategists to find and replicate top-performing ads.
Added e2e testing suites with full coverage to all core applications run during CI/CD pipelines effectively eliminating production outages and speeding up development.
Developed an internal web application for helping teams find and iterate on high performing ads.

contractExperience.title: Software Engineer
accomplishments: Developed laboratory software used to score samples to track asbestos presence.
Sped up the in-house workflow making AAC the #1 asbestos analysis lab in Canberra leading to the company’s eventual buyout.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
accomplishments: Developed numerous features and integrations with 3rd party companies to expand the company's reach and capabilities.
Led the company-wide rollover to Zendesk for customer service issue tracking and ticket creation by using a tested, rich feature set of back-end services and custom integrations.
Led and developed the web application's migration from the in-house payment system to Stripe.
Developed the Google authentication portal for all employees accessing production internal tooling.
Migrated the legacy client web application from AngularJs to ReactJs with an animated signup flow that dramatically improving conversion and customer acquisition.
Led the charge for the client applications to adopt typesafe practices using Flow to avoid production downtime.
Created an e2e testing suite with full coverage that was run during CI/CD pipeline effectively eliminating production outages and speeding up development.
Developed numerous features for both website and web services that were required to handle millions of hits per month.

workExperience.title: Applications Engineer
accomplishments: Introducted the District into the use of modular components and away from server-side templates in an unsupported language.
Developed custom ORM and query builder layer on top of Coldfusion for faster development cycles.

Launched major projects in record time that included a district-wide mileage tracking software, inventory warehouse request/distribution software, special needs enrollment program and a district-wide volunteer signup / event management system.

projects.title: Stock trading bot
accomplishments: Developed a NodeJS stock bot that watches up to 300 stock tickers at once and uses information streamed in via WebSockets to determine trade entry and exit points.

Build a Selenium tool to scrape various websites to get volatile stocks and then integrates with Polygon.io to aggregate data. The data is then run through using various technical analysis and risk management strategies to determine trade entries in real-time.
Engineered a fully robust set of backtesting scripts are used to determine strategy expected performance as well as create equity curves that can be displayed in chart format in the browser.

projects.title: Zoodit App
accomplishments: Developed a map-based Reddit style application in React Native that was approved and made available on the Apple App Store.

projects.title: Drivyn
accomplishments: Developed High school driver’s education management software that was used to track student's progress towards obtaining their license.
Helped students sign up for scheduled drive times and allowed instructors to track attendance and hours.
Over 5,000 students have obtained their driver's license through the program and counting.

projects.title: WoW Classic Dungeon Signup bot
accomplishments: Developed a NodeJS Discord bot that was invited into over 1000 servers.
Developed an easier way for players of World of Warcraft Classic to easily manage groups for a scheduled time.
Managed a Discord server that communicated features to 12,000+ users and saw over 100,000 signups.

funHighlights.text: 5-year Division 1 NCAA Scholarship athlete for the University of Utah football program and member of the team's Leadership Council.
Successful WoW guild leader in charge of gathering and leading 40 man groups through challenging encounters bi-weekly.
Proud owner of a Discord bot developer badge which is given to developers with bots in over 1000+ servers.
